Workflow.Name: BACore | Runtime - Start Node
Workflow.Description: Cloud flow that processes each Node for a stage instance at runtime. This is triggered when a Node instance is created. This cloud flow will create an approval instance according to the Approvers defined in the node.

Description.description: Cloud flow that processes each Node for a stage instance at runtime. This is triggered when a Node instance is created. This cloud flow will create an approval instance according to the Approvers defined in the node.
